content:
Hey there! Thanks for checking out the Echo Engine!

This engine uses SFML and ImGUI for the 2D side of things, and you can pick between Vulkan and DirectX12 for the 3D stuff, that also uses ImGUI!

Right now it's not released to the public. I say 2025 Q4 will be the release of the engine. I know it sounds like a long wait, but if you join the discord you can apply to be a beta tester!
